div.head: 屍厥
div.div: corpse[-like condition because of qi] recession

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: corpse[-like condition because of qi] recession

sense.def: Pathological Condition of sudden unconsciousness. Patients are unable to recognize people, while the pulse remains normal. Su wen 素問 63: 人身脈皆動，而形無知也，其狀若屍，或 曰屍厥 , “This makes all the vessels in the [affected] person’s body move while his physical appearance gives no response. These people resemble a corpse. Sometimes it is called corpse[-like condition because of qi] recession .
